Plot: An ecological drama/documentary, filmed throughout the globe. Part thriller, part meditation on the vanishing wonders of the sub-aquatic world.
Title: Oceans
Writer: Christophe Cheysson, Jacques Cluzaud, Laurent Debas, Stéphane Durand, Laurent Gaudé, Jacques Perrin, François Sarano
Actors: Pierce Brosnan, Pedro Armendáriz Jr., Jacques Perrin, Rie Miyazawa
tomatoConsensus: Oceans adds another visually stunning chapter to the Disney Nature library.
Country: France, Switzerland, Spain, USA, United Arab Emirates
